I am a gummy worm maker, and I love my job!
I've been enjoying my new hobbies of rock collecting and macaroni art.
I enjoy visiting the beach, but my favorite exotic place is the island of Bali.

content.text: Hey there! How are you doing today?
Good! Just got home from work, a little tired. How about you?
Doing alright. I'm a gummy worm maker, and I love my job! What do you do for a living?
I'm a welding instructor, and I really enjoy it!
That's great! I love working with my hands too. What's your favorite thing about your job?
I love seeing the students progress, and helping them learn a new skill.
That's a great feeling! I'm passionate about making music, and I love expressing myself through it. Do you have any hobbies?
I usually go for a walk to clear my head, and I love collecting stamps.
Stamp collecting is really cool! I like to go to the beach, but my favorite exotic place is the island of Bali.
Bali looks amazing! I've never been, but I'd love to go sometime.
I hope you get to go soon! Do you have any kids?
I have one child, a little boy.
That's great! I have one child too, a little girl.
We should get together sometime and let our kids play!
That would be fun! I'd love to meet your son.
Great! I'll give you my number and we can set something up.
